issue.title: Improve support of WCHAR in 1.0
issue.body:
Current support of wchar is very limited (unlike 0.17 version), there's not much sense of declared wchar support when one can only use formatting string as wchar, not arguments.
Only this works:
```cpp
logger->info(L"This is a text {}", "HELLO");
```
but this not:
```cpp
logger->info(L"This is a text {}", L"HELLO");
```
neither this
```cpp
logger->info(L"This is a text {}", std::wstring(L"HELLO") );
```
